uientry.s:
function InitState(state) local textWidth = state.Text.DisplayWidth state.Images[2].Width = textWidth + 10 state.Images[3].X = textWidth + 10 + state.Images[1].Width
Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.Move, Address) return state end
function LClick() Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.LClickUp, Address) end

function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") - Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end

function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") + Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end

function InitState(state) local textWidth = state.Text.DisplayWidth state.Images[2].Width = textWidth + 10 state.Images[3].X = textWidth + 10 + state.Images[1].Width
Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.Move, Address) return state end
function LClick() Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.LClickUp, Address) end

function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") - Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end

function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") + Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end
